CustomField.description: ADO 269310 Lift and Shift PSA Prod to GTM
CustomField.formula: IF( pse__Timecard_Header__r.pse__Daily_Bill_Rate__c = TRUE, pse__Timecard_Header__r.Sold_Bill_Rate__c * pse__Total_Days_Worked__c, pse__Timecard_Header__r.Sold_Bill_Rate__c * pse__Total_Hours__c )
CustomField.label: Sold Billable Amount
